document_data.name: Fallas' Treasures of Thentia
document_data.owner: [[Fallas of Thentia]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Fallas' Treasures of Thentia''' was a shop that dealt in fine [[silk]]s on the grand [[Promenade (Suzail)|Promenade]] of [[Suzail]] in [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Description:
In the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the store was ran by [[Fallas]], a merchant of [[Thentia]]. Fallas' Treasures sold delicate laced items of clothing, lingerie, expensive silks, [[sash]]es, costume [[jewelry]], and other fanciful finery.

The shop faced the [[Tower of the Royal Magician]] across the Promenade and neighbored a merchants' drinking club called [[Bindle's]].{{Cite dungeon/198/Backdrop: Suzail|65-66}}
